020package org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal;
021
022import static java.util.Arrays.stream;
023import static java.util.Collections.unmodifiableList;
024import static java.util.stream.Collectors.toList;
025import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.DEPRECATED;
026import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
027import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.OBJECT;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.checkState;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.isNull;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
032
033import javax.lang.model.element.TypeParameterElement;
034import javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror;
035import javax.lang.model.type.TypeVariable;
036import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
037import java.lang.reflect.Type;
038import java.util.ArrayList;
039import java.util.Collection;
040import java.util.HashMap;
041import java.util.List;
042import java.util.Map;
043
044import org.apiguardian.api.API;
045import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
046import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.ValidationException;
047import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.AnnotationSpec;
048import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeName;
049import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeVariableName;
050
051/**
052 *  The implementation of
053 *  {@link TypeNameImpl}
054 *  for type variable names.
055 *
056 *  @author Square,Inc.
057 *  @modified Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
058 *  @version $Id: TypeVariableNameImpl.java 1066 2023-09-28 19:51:53Z tquadrat $
059 *  @since 0.0.5
060 *
061 *  @UMLGraph.link
062 */
063@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: TypeVariableNameImpl.java 1066 2023-09-28 19:51:53Z tquadrat $" )
064@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
065public final class TypeVariableNameImpl extends TypeNameImpl implements TypeVariableName
066{
067        /*------------*\
068    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
069        \*------------*/
070    /**
071     *  The bounds.
072     */
073    private final List<TypeNameImpl> m_Bounds;
074
075    /**
076     *  The name of this type variable.
077     */
078    private final String m_Name;
079
080        /*--------------*\
081    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
082        \*--------------*/
083    /**
084     *  Creates a new {@code TypeVariableNameImpl} instance.
085     *
086     *  @param  name    The name.
087     *  @param  bounds  The bounds.
088     */
089    public TypeVariableNameImpl( final String name, final List<TypeNameImpl> bounds )
090    {
091        this( name, bounds, new ArrayList<>() );
092    }   //  TypeVariableNameImpl()
093
094    /**
095     *  Creates a new {@code TypeVariableNameImpl} instance.
096     *
097     *  @param  name    The name.
098     *  @param  bounds  The bounds.
099     *  @param  annotations The annotations.
100     */
101    public TypeVariableNameImpl( final String name, final List<TypeNameImpl> bounds, final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> annotations )
102    {
103        super( annotations );
104        m_Name = requireNonNullArgument( name, "name" );
105        m_Bounds = requireNonNullArgument( bounds, "bounds" );
106
107        for( final var bound : m_Bounds )
108        {
109            checkState( !bound.isPrimitive() && bound != VOID_PRIMITIVE, () -> new ValidationException( "invalid bound: %s".formatted( bound ) ) );
110        }
111    }   //  TypeVariableNameImpl()
112
113        /*---------*\
114    ====** Methods **==========================================================
115        \*---------*/
116    /**
117     *  {@inheritDoc}
118     */
119    @Override
120    public final TypeVariableNameImpl annotated( final List<AnnotationSpec> annotations )
121    {
122        final var retValue = new TypeVariableNameImpl( m_Name, m_Bounds, requireNonNullArgument( annotations, "annotations" ).stream().map( a -> (AnnotationSpecImpl) a ).collect( toList() ) );
123
124        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
125        return retValue;
126    }   //  annotated()
127
128    /**
129     *  Return the bounds for this type variable name.
130     *
131     *  @return The bounds.
132     */
133    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
134    public final List<TypeNameImpl> bounds() { return List.copyOf( m_Bounds ); }
135
136    /**
137     *  {@inheritDoc}
138     */
139    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
140    @Override
141    public final CodeWriter emit( final CodeWriter out ) throws UncheckedIOException
142    {
143        final var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( out, "out" );
144        emitAnnotations( retValue );
145        retValue.emitAndIndent( m_Name );
146
147        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
148        return retValue;
149    }   //  emit()
150
151    /**
152     *  Returns type variable equivalent to the given type.
153     *
154     *  @param  type    The type.
155     *  @return The type variable name.
156     */
157    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
158    public static final TypeVariableNameImpl from( final java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable<?> type )
159    {
160        final var retValue = from( type, Map.of() );
161
162        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
163        return retValue;
164    }   //  from()
165
166    /**
167     *  Returns type variable equivalent to the given type, after applying the
168     *  given type variables
169     *  .
170     *  @param  type    The type.
171     *  @param  typeVariables   The type variables.
172     *  @return The type variable name.
173     */
174    @SuppressWarnings( {"BoundedWildcard"} )
175    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
176    public static final TypeVariableNameImpl from( final java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable<?> type, final Map<Type,TypeVariableName> typeVariables )
177    {
178        var retValue = (TypeVariableNameImpl) requireNonNullArgument( typeVariables, "typeVariables" )
179            .get( requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" ) );
180        if( isNull( retValue) )
181        {
182            final List<TypeNameImpl> bounds = new ArrayList<>();
183            final var visibleBounds = unmodifiableList( bounds );
184            retValue = new TypeVariableNameImpl( type.getName(), visibleBounds );
185            final Map<Type,TypeVariableName> typeVariablesCopy = new HashMap<>( typeVariables );
186            typeVariablesCopy.put( type, retValue );
187            for( final var bound : type.getBounds() )
188            {
189                bounds.add( TypeNameImpl.from( bound, Map.copyOf( typeVariablesCopy ) ) );
190            }
191            bounds.remove( OBJECT );
192        }
193
194        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
195        return retValue;
196    }   //  from()
197
198    /**
199     *  Returns a new type variable named {@code name} without bounds.
200     *
201     *  @param  name    The name.
202     *  @return The type variable name.
203     */
204    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
205    public static final TypeVariableNameImpl from( final String name )
206    {
207        final var retValue = of( name, List.of() );
208
209        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
210        return retValue;
211    }   //  from()
212
213    /**
214     *  Returns a new type variable named {@code name} with {@code bounds}.
215     *
216     *  @param  name    The name.
217     *  @param  bounds  The bounds.
218     *  @return The type variable name.
219     */
220    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
221    public static final TypeVariableNameImpl from( final String name, final Type... bounds )
222    {
223        final var retValue = of( name, list( requireNonNullArgument( bounds, "bounds" ) ) );
224
225        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
226        return retValue;
227    }   //  from()
228
229    /**
230     *  Returns a new type variable named {@code name} with {@code bounds}.
231     *
232     *  @param  name    The name.
233     *  @param  bounds  The bounds.
234     *  @return The type variable name.
235     */
236    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
237    public static final TypeVariableNameImpl from( final String name, final TypeName... bounds )
238    {
239        final var retValue = of( name, stream( requireNonNullArgument( bounds, "bounds" ) )
240            .map( typeName -> (TypeNameImpl) typeName )
241            .toList() );
242
243        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
244        return retValue;
245    }   //  from()
246
247    /**
248     *  Returns a type variable name that is equivalent to the given element.
249     *
250     *  @param  element The element.
251     *  @return The new type variable name.
252     */
253    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
254    public static final TypeVariableNameImpl from( final TypeParameterElement element )
255    {
256        final var name = requireNonNullArgument( element, "element" ).getSimpleName().toString();
257        final var boundsMirrors = element.getBounds();
258
259        final var boundsTypeNames = boundsMirrors.stream()
260            .map( typeMirror -> TypeNameImpl.from( typeMirror, Map.of() ) )
261            .toList();
262        final var retValue = of( name, boundsTypeNames );
263
264        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
265        return retValue;
266    }   //  from()
267
268    /**
269     *  Returns a type variable name that is equivalent to the given mirror.
270     *
271     *  @param  mirror  The mirror.
272     *  @return The new type variable name.
273     */
274    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
275    public static TypeVariableNameImpl from( final TypeVariable mirror )
276    {
277        final var retValue = from( (TypeParameterElement) requireNonNullArgument( mirror, "mirror" ).asElement() );
278
279        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
280        return retValue;
281    }   //  from()
282
283    /**
284     *  Makes an instance of {@code TypeVariableName} for the given
285     *  {@link javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror}.
286     *  This form is used internally to avoid infinite recursion in cases like
287     *  {@code Enum<E extends Enum<E>>}. When such a thing is encountered, a
288     *  {@code TypeVariableName} without bounds is made, and that is added to
289     *  the {@code typeVariables} map before looking up the bounds. Then if
290     *  encountered again while constructing the bounds, this
291     *  {@code TypeVariableName} can be just returned from the map. And, the
292     *  code that put the entry in {@code variables} will make sure that the
293     *  bounds are filled in before returning.
294     *
295     *  @param  mirror  The {@code TypeMirror}.
296     *  @param  typeVariables   The type variables.
297     *  @return The new type variable name.
298     */
299    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
300    public static final TypeVariableNameImpl from( final TypeVariable mirror, final Map<TypeParameterElement,TypeVariableNameImpl> typeVariables )
301    {
302        final var element = (TypeParameterElement) requireNonNullArgument( mirror, "mirror" ).asElement();
303        var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( typeVariables, "typeVariables" ).get( element );
304        if( isNull( retValue ) )
305        {
306            /*
307             * This code is a dirty hack: bounds will be modified after the
308             * return value was created with that list.
309             */
310            final List<TypeNameImpl> bounds = new ArrayList<>();
311            retValue = new TypeVariableNameImpl( element.getSimpleName().toString(), bounds );
312            typeVariables.put( element, retValue );
313            for( final TypeMirror typeMirror : element.getBounds() )
314            {
315                bounds.add( TypeNameImpl.from( typeMirror, typeVariables ) );
316            }
317            bounds.remove( OBJECT );
318        }
319
320        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
321        return retValue;
322    }   //  from()
323
324    /**
325     *  Returns type variable equivalent to the given type.
326     *
327     *  @param  type    The type.
328     *  @return The type variable name.
329     *
330     *  @deprecated Use
331     *      {@link #from(java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable)}
332     *      instead.
333     */
334    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
335    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
336    public static final TypeVariableNameImpl get( final java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable<?> type ) { return from( type ); }
337
338    /**
339     *  Returns type variable equivalent to the given type, after applying the
340     *  given type variables
341     *  .
342     *  @param  type    The type.
343     *  @param  typeVariables   The type variables.
344     *  @return The type variable name.
345     *
346     *  @deprecated Use
347     *      {@link #from(java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable, Map)}
348     *      instead.
349     */
350    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
351    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
352    public static final TypeVariableNameImpl get( final java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable<?> type, final Map<Type,TypeVariableName> typeVariables )
353    {
354        final var retValue = from( type, typeVariables );
355
356        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
357        return retValue;
358    }   //  get()
359
360    /**
361     *  Returns a new type variable named {@code name} without bounds.
362     *
363     *  @param  name    The name.
364     *  @return The type variable name.
365     *
366     *  @deprecated Use
367     *      {@link #from(String)}
368     *      instead.
369     */
370    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
371    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
372    public static final TypeVariableNameImpl get( final String name ) { return from( name ); }
373
374    /**
375     *  Returns a new type variable named {@code name} with {@code bounds}.
376     *
377     *  @param  name    The name.
378     *  @param  bounds  The bounds.
379     *  @return The type variable name.
380     *
381     *  @deprecated Use
382     *      {@link #from(String,Type...)}
383     *      instead.
384     */
385    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
386    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
387    public static final TypeVariableNameImpl get( final String name, final Type... bounds )
388    {
389        final var retValue = from( name, bounds );
390
391        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
392        return retValue;
393    }   //  get()
394
395    /**
396     *  Returns a new type variable named {@code name} with {@code bounds}.
397     *
398     *  @param  name    The name.
399     *  @param  bounds  The bounds.
400     *  @return The type variable name.
401     *
402     *  @deprecated Use
403     *      {@link #from(String,TypeName...)}
404     *      instead.
405     */
406    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
407    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
408    public static final TypeVariableNameImpl get( final String name, final TypeName... bounds )
409    {
410        final var retValue = from( name, bounds );
411
412        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
413        return retValue;
414    }   //  get()
415
416    /**
417     *  Returns a type variable name that is equivalent to the given element.
418     *
419     *  @param  element The element.
420     *  @return The new type variable name.
421     *
422     *  @deprecated Use
423     *      {@link #from(TypeParameterElement)}
424     *      instead.
425     */
426    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
427    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
428    public static final TypeVariableNameImpl get( final TypeParameterElement element ) { return from( element ); }
429
430    /**
431     *  Returns a type variable name that is equivalent to the given mirror.
432     *
433     *  @param  mirror  The mirror.
434     *  @return The new type variable name.
435     *
436     *  @deprecated Use
437     *      {@link #from(TypeVariable)}
438     *      instead.
439     */
440    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
441    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
442    public static TypeVariableNameImpl get( final TypeVariable mirror ) { return from( mirror ); }
443
444    /**
445     *  Makes an instance of {@code TypeVariableName} for the given
446     *  {@link javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror}.
447     *  This form is used internally to avoid infinite recursion in cases like
448     *  {@code Enum<E extends Enum<E>>}. When such a thing is encountered, a
449     *  {@code TypeVariableName} without bounds is made, and that is added to
450     *  the {@code typeVariables} map before looking up the bounds. Then if
451     *  encountered again while constructing the bounds, this
452     *  {@code TypeVariableName} can be just returned from the map. And, the
453     *  code that put the entry in {@code variables} will make sure that the
454     *  bounds are filled in before returning.
455     *
456     *  @param  mirror  The {@code TypeMirror}.
457     *  @param  typeVariables   The type variables.
458     *  @return The new type variable name.
459     *
460     *  @deprecated Use
461     *      {@link #from(TypeVariable, Map)}
462     *      instead.
463     */
464    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
465    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
466    public static final TypeVariableNameImpl get( final TypeVariable mirror, final Map<TypeParameterElement,TypeVariableNameImpl> typeVariables )
467    {
468        final var retValue = from( mirror, typeVariables );
469
470        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
471        return retValue;
472    }   //  get()
473
474    /**
475     *  Returns the name of this type variable.
476     *
477     *  @return The name.
478     */
479    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
480    public final String name() { return m_Name; }
481
482    /**
483     *  Creates a new instance of {@code TypeVariableName} from the given name
484     *  and the given bounds.
485     *
486     *  @param  name    The name.
487     *  @param  bounds  The bounds.
488     *  @return The new instance.
489     */
490    private static final TypeVariableNameImpl of( final String name, final Collection<TypeNameImpl> bounds )
491    {
492        //---* Strip java.lang.Object from bounds if it is present *-----------
493        final var boundsNoObject = bounds.stream()
494            .filter( typeName -> !typeName.equals( OBJECT ) )
495            .toList();
496        final var retValue = new TypeVariableNameImpl( name, boundsNoObject );
497
498        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
499        return retValue;
500    }   //  of()
501
502    /**
503     *  {@inheritDoc}
504     */
505    @Override
506    public final TypeVariableNameImpl withBounds( final List<TypeName> bounds )
507    {
508        final var newBounds = new ArrayList<>( m_Bounds );
509        newBounds.addAll( requireNonNullArgument( bounds, "bounds" )
510            .stream()
511            .map( t -> (TypeNameImpl) t )
512            .toList()
513        );
514        final var retValue = new TypeVariableNameImpl( m_Name, List.copyOf( newBounds ), annotations() );
515
516        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
517        return retValue;
518    }   //  withBounds()
519
520    /**
521     *  Returns a new {@code TypeVariableName} instance as a copy of this one,
522     *  with the given bounds added.
523     *
524     *  @param  bounds  The additional bounds.
525     *  @return The new type variable name.
526     */
527    @Override
528    public final TypeVariableNameImpl withBounds( final Type... bounds )
529    {
530        final var newBounds = new ArrayList<>( m_Bounds );
531        newBounds.addAll( TypeNameImpl.list( requireNonNullArgument( bounds, "bounds" ) ) );
532        final var retValue = new TypeVariableNameImpl( m_Name, List.copyOf( newBounds ), annotations() );
533
534        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
535        return retValue;
536    }   //  withBounds()
537
538    /**
539     *  Returns a new {@code TypeVariableName} instance as a copy of this one,
540     *  with the given bounds added.
541     *
542     *  @param  bounds  The additional bounds.
543     *  @return The new type variable name.
544     */
545    @Override
546    public final TypeVariableNameImpl withBounds( final TypeName... bounds )
547    {
548        final var retValue = withBounds( List.of( bounds ) );
549
550        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
551        return retValue;
552    }   //  withBounds()
553
554    /**
555     *  {@inheritDoc}
556     */
557    @Override
558    public final TypeVariableNameImpl withoutAnnotations() { return new TypeVariableNameImpl( m_Name, m_Bounds ); }
559}
560//  class TypeVariableNameImpl
561
